__e: Although I cannot move and I have to speak through a computer, in my mind...
And so I'm trying to move, and I wanna see it, and I'm looking, like straining to look up, straining to look up.
Although I cannot move and I have to speak through a computer, in my mind I am free.
I can't move from that place, and I'm all alone and so lonely.
That is, anywhere I go, I can move left-right, back-forth, or up-down.
That's what I think, I won't get out of here.
